title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard, the context for nested classes is not set correctly.
OB: When a .java file is open in the editor and the new class button is clicked, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click on the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field.
